description: Detects potential abuse of Active Directory Replication Service (ADRS) from a non machine account to request credentials. Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Active Directory Replication from Non Machine Account
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND (winlog.event_id:"4662" AND winlog.event_data.AccessMask:"0x100" AND winlog.event_data.Properties:(*1131f6aa\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2* OR *1131f6ad\-9c07\-11d1\-f79f\-00c04fc2dcd2* OR *89e95b76\-444d\-4c62\-991a\-0facbeda640c*)) AND (NOT (winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:*$ OR winlog.event_data.SubjectUserName:MSOL_*)))
